mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FITNESS_TRAINER_CAREER(CNO, TRAINERID, CAREERNAME, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, COMMENTS) VALUES( SEQ_CAREER.NEXTVAL, #{trainerId}, #{careerName}, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{comments})
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENTS FROM FITNESS_TRAINER_CAREER WHERE TRAINERID = #{id} AND COMMENTS IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY CNO DESC
SELECT * FROM FITNESS_TRAINER_CAREER WHERE TRAINERID = #{id} ORDER BY CNO
mapper.update: UPDATE FITNESS_TRAINER_CAREER SET CAREERNAME = #{careerName}, STARTDATE = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), ENDDATE = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE CNO = #{cno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FITNESS_PT_RESERVE(RESERVE_NO, T_ID, M_ID, RESERVE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME) VALUES( SEQ_RESERVE.NEXTVAL, #{trainerId}, #{memberId}, TO_CAHR(TO_DATE(#{reserveDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') )
